Description:
HotelDescription#This all inclusive resort is situated on the beach, in around 26 hectares of tropical gardens. The garden path leads directly to the beach. The range of services offered and the countless activities available make this resort the perfect place for romantic couples, active singles and families.

The 26 hectare resort was designed for the 5 holiday villages gathered around Seaside Cove, where guests may find the swimming pools, daytime and nighttime entertainment and restaurants. Amongst the hotel's facilities count a lobby area with a reception desk manned around the clock and a safe. Furthermore, the resort offers a café, a mini supermarket, 4 bars, 5 speciality restaurants with a separate eating area for children and public Internet access. Younger guests may let off steam in the kid's club. The laundry service (charges apply) rounds up the facilities available here. Parking is available for guests arriving by car.

Each of the resort's villages has its own signature colour and playful name: Julie Mango, Whispering Palms, Magic Parrot, Banana Liming and Hummingbird. The rooms all come with an en suite bathroom with hairdryer. Furthermore all rooms are equipped with cable TV, a telephone, a safe (a fee will be charged), a clock radio, a coffee maker, ironing equipment and a king-size bed. The air conditioning can be individually regulated.

A continental breakfast buffet is served each morning.
